body_content.explanation: not happening or done at the same time or speed:
examples: This finding suggests asynchronous climate changes in the Northern and Southern hemispheres.

body_content.explanation: (of learning or teaching) involving students working separately at different times, for example using recorded lessons or the internet, rather than involving students and teacher taking part in a lesson all at the same time:
examples: In asynchronous learning the interaction between instructors and students occurs intermittently with a time delay.
Get a first look at our asynchronous training modules and participate in the educator feedback process.
